name: Tandoori Chicken Curry
preparation: In a bowl, combine chicken with seasoning.
Heat oil in a large sauté pan over medium-high heat.
Add chicken to pan; stir-fry until cooked, about 5 min. Stir in chickpeas and spinach. Cook for 2 min.
Remove from heat; stir in yogurt. Using the 2-in-1 Citrus Press, squeeze in juice from lime.
tips: To make Chicken Tandoori, preheat oven to 400° F. In a large bowl, whisk seasoning with 2 tbsp each lime juice and 2% yogurt. Cut 2 lbs boneless, skinless chicken into medium pieces; add to bowl and coat. Arrange chicken on lined sheet pan. Roast 15–18 min, until cooked.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1⁄2 cup rice and 1 cup steamed veggies.
